opendmx

Interface FTDI_D2XX


  • public interface FTDI_D2XX
    Interface for interacting with the DLL driver that controls the OpenDMX hardware. DO NOT DO ANYTHING WITH THIS CLASS DIRECTLY. Unless you know what you're doing.

    • Field Summary
